data.Sentence_cn: 一辆古旧的汽车停在一条干涸的河床边，一群著名男女演员下了车。
data.Sentence: An ancient bus stopped by a dry river bed and a party of famous actors and actresses got off.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们戴着墨镜，穿着旧衣裳，特别小心以防别人认出他们。
data.Sentence: Dressed in dark glasses and old clothes, they had taken special precautions so that no one should recognize them.

data.Sentence_cn: 但他们很快就发觉，化装的效果有时过分完美了。
data.Sentence: But as they soon discovered, disguises can sometimes be too perfect.

data.Sentence_cn: “在这个地方野餐简直太妙了，”格格利亚.格利姆说。
data.Sentence: 'This is a wonderful place for a picnic,' said Gloria Gleam.

data.Sentence_cn: “是再好不过的了，格格利亚。”布林克斯利.米尔斯表示同意，
data.Sentence: 'It couldn't be better, Gloria,' Brinksley Meers agreed.

data.Sentence_cn: “没有记者，没有影迷！我们为什么不经常来这里呢？”
data.Sentence: 'No newspaper men, no film fans! Why don't we come more often?'

data.Sentence_cn: 此时，另外两位演员，罗克沃尔.斯林格和默林.格里夫斯，已经把两个大食品篮子提到了一片树荫下。
data.Sentence: Meanwhile, two other actors, Rockwall Slinger and Merlin Greeves, had carried two large food baskets to a shady spot under some trees.

data.Sentence_cn: 当他们都已安排舒适时，一个陌生人出现了。
data.Sentence: When they had all made themselves comfortable, a stranger appeared.

data.Sentence_cn: “你们都从这里走开，全都走开！”他大叫着，"我是这里的司法长官。你们看到那个公告牌了吗？上面写着‘禁止野营’——除非你们不识字！”
data.Sentence: 'Now you get out of here, all of you!' he shouted. 'I'm sheriff here. Do you See that notice? It says" No Camping"—in case you can't read!'

data.Sentence_cn: “好了，好了，司法官，”罗克沃尔说， “别使我们难堪。
data.Sentence: 'Look, sheriff,' said Rockwall, 'don't be too hard on us.

data.Sentence_cn: 我是罗克沃尔·斯林格，这位是默林·格里夫斯。”
data.Sentence: I'm Rockwall Slinger and this is Merlin Greeves.'

data.Sentence_cn: “噢，是吗？”那位司法长官冷笑一声说道，
data.Sentence: 'Oh, is it?' said the sheriff with a sneer.

data.Sentence_cn: “好，我就是布林克斯利·米尔斯。我还有一个名字叫格格利亚·格利姆。
data.Sentence: 'Well, I'm Brinksley Meers, and my other name is Gloria Gleam.
Now you get out of here fast!'
